scripts.start: npm run eslint && IS_OFFLINE=${IS_OFFLINE:-true} DYNAMO_PORT=${DYNAMO_PORT:-8000} SERVERLESS_PORT=${SERVERLESS_PORT:-3000} ./node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless offline start
scripts.test: npm run dynamodb > /dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 5 && IS_OFFLINE=${IS_OFFLINE:-true} DYNAMO_PORT=${DYNAMO_PORT:-8000} SERVERLESS_PORT=${SERVERLESS_PORT:-3000} node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/**/*.unitTest.js && pkill -2 java
scripts.test-i: npm run start > /dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 5 && IS_OFFLINE=${IS_OFFLINE:-true} DYNAMO_PORT=${DYNAMO_PORT:-8000} SERVERLESS_PORT=${SERVERLESS_PORT:-3000} node_modules/.bin/mocha tests/**/*.intTest.js && pkill -2 node && pkill -2 java
